name: Children of War: Blood And Snow
blurb: An open world, 1-4 player cooperative fantasy RPG with real-time combat system and heavy emphasis on exploration and discovery.

rewards.reward: BACKER ONLY WALLPAPER - - - \r\nThe Nar'Sa'Mon have accepted your offering.  You will receive a message of thanks from one of the Cyrnic kings + an exclusive, backer-only Blood And Snow hi-res wallpaper pack.   In-Game/Forum title: "The Kind"

THE GAME - - - 
For your pledge the false gods reward you with a digital DRM-free copy of the game on PC or MAC.   In-Game/Forum title:  "Founder"    
                                                                                        
                                                                                            
***EARLY BIRD BONUS***  (See Early Bird Bonus Description in the updates section to the left!)

SPECIAL EDITION GAME - - - \r\nFor your generosity Hendren himself thanks you with a digital Special Edition DRM-free copy of the game on PC or MAC + PDF instruction manual.  This special edition will only be available to backers and will include a ghost vanity pet!  You will be able to choose either a phoenix, dragon or Raven.   These pets know all the ancient Cyrnic and Sypric songs and if one of them is active while you play it will sing these legends as the player approaches important landmarks and points of interest.  Non-backer players will still be able to read about the lore at these points of interest but only backers will have the benefit of hearing the ancient songs telling these stories!  In-Game/Forum title: "Magistrate"\r\n***EARLY BIRD BONUS***  (See Early Bird Bonus Description in the updates section to the left!)

EARLY GAME ACCESS - - - \r\nSpyric energy floods your mind, giving you new sight into the spirit realm and insight into the future. You have earned all previous tier rewards + closed beta access + early access to the character, weapon, armor and mount customization system + special thanks credit.   In-Game/Forum title: "Scout"\r\n***EARLY BIRD BONUS***  (See Early Bird Bonus Description in the updates section to the left!)

DIGITAL OST and DIGITAL ART BOOK - - - Your power has attracted nascent spirits. They surround you even now.\r\nYou have earned all previous tier rewards + a beautiful digital art book packed with pre-production concept art, story notes, storyboards, production and fan art + a digital copy of the OST written by composer Austin Lawrence!   In-Game/Forum title: "Child of the Phoenix".\r\n***EARLY BIRD BONUS***  (See Early Bird Bonus Description in the updates section to the left!)

+ INVENTORY and YOUR NAME IMMORTALIZED - - - \r\nThe Spyric Lords take notice of you this day. Marked as a force of great power, you have earned all previous tier rewards + a permanent upgrade to your inventory space on all characters + your name engraved on a headstone at a graveyard outside of an important game location.   In-Game/Forum title: "The Mighty"  ***EARLY BIRD BONUS***  (See Early Bird Bonus Description in the updates section to the left!)

EXCLUSIVE WEAPON, MOUNT or ARMOR SET - - - 
*********************EXCLUSIVE REWARD TIER**********************
As a devout follower of the Nar'Sa'Mon you have earned all previous tier rewards and the right to choose one from 5 exclusive armor sets, weapons or mounts only available to backers + an additional digital copy of the game (PC or MAC) + a digital lore bible full of story, linguistics, character background stories and more.   In-Game/Forum title: "Collector".

***(Note: Exclusive armor, weapon and mount sets are still in design and the final look of these sets will be determined in part by the backers of this tier who will be contacted and will participate in a concept art poll to vote for the armor, weapons and mounts they would like as their choices.  Backers will have up until game launch to make final decision on these items.)***

SPECIAL BACKER-ONLY BOX EDITION GAME - - - \r\n********************EXCLUSIVE REWARD TIER*********************\r\nYou have earned all previous tier rewards + to honor you for your great sacrifice for humanity, the Nar'Sa'Mon have commissioned an exclusive, backer-only special edition box copy with color manual for you.  In-Game/Forum title: "Curator".

POSTER SIZED GAME WORLD MAP - - - \r\n********************EXCLUSIVE REWARD TIER*********************\r\nYour dedication to the history and study of Cyrn has earned you all items from previous non-exclusive tiers + full color map of the game world signed by the creators of the game.  In-Game/Forum title: "Cartographer".

SOFTCOVER PRINTED ART BOOK - - - \r\n********************EXCLUSIVE REWARD TIER********************* \r\nThe Gods smile down on you and impart the beauty of their creations upon you. You have earned previous non-exclusive tier items + a gorgeous printed softcover version of the digital art book full of concepts, story notes, storyboards, production and fan art!  In-Game/Forum title: "Conservator".

HELP US DESIGN SOME BAD GUYS - - -   \r\n********************EXCLUSIVE REWARD TIER********************* \r\nThe Gods see your creative potential and impart a portion of their power to you.  You have earned all previous non-exclusive tier items + you will be a part of our backer-development team! You will be granted access to a special developer only forum and Facebook group and will be invited to participate in a series of video conferences where you will help us design mobs for the game.  Your name will also be in the credits as a backer-developer!  In-Game/Forum title: "Creator".

HELP US DESIGN A PLAYER MOUNT - - - \r\n********************EXCLUSIVE REWARD TIER********************* \r\nYour love for the beasts of Cyrn have not gone unnoticed.  You have earned all previous non-exclusive tier items + you will be a part of our backer-developer team! You will be granted access to a special developer only forum and Facebook group and will be invited to participate in a series of video conferences where you will help us design mounts for the game.  Your name will also be in the credits as a backer-developer!  In-Game/Forum title: "Creator".

HELP US DESIGN A GAME BOSS - - -   \r\n********************EXCLUSIVE REWARD TIER********************* \r\nYour courage and fortitude have put you in good standing with the Nar'Sa'Mon, a feat not easily accomplished.  You have earned all previous non-exclusive tier items + you will be a part of our backer-developer team! You will be granted access to a special developer only forum and Facebook group and will be invited to participate in a series of video conferences where you will help us design a game boss from ground up.  Your name will also be in the credits as a backer-developer!  In-Game/Forum title: "Creator".

HELP US DESIGN A GAME DUNGEON - - -  \r\n********************EXCLUSIVE REWARD TIER********************* \r\nThe people of Cyrn value an industrious mason and you have proven you are more than capable.  You have earned all previous non-exclusive tier items + you will be a part of our backer-developer team! You will be granted access to a special developer only forum and Facebook group and will be invited to participate in a series of video conferences where you will help us design an important dungeon from ground up.  Your name will also be in the credits as a backer-developer!  In-Game/Forum title: "Creator".

BECOME A FANTASY CHARACTER - - - \r\nConfidence is a strength worthy of recognition.  You have earned all previous non-exclusive tier items + with your picture and input we will create a high-res digital painting of you in the style of Blood And Snow concept art!  In-Game/Forum title: The Vain.

BECOME A MAJOR NPC IN THE GAME - - - \r\nYour dedication to Cyrn has somehow merged your essence with the realm.  Strong Spyric magic now ties you to our world.  You have earned all previous non-exclusive tier items + we will use your likeness to create the look of a prominent NPC every player will most likely see!  We will also work with you to establish back-story and personality for your character.  In-Game/Forum title: Spirit Drifter.

A 3D PRINTED MODEL FROM THE GAME - - - \r\nThe Nar'Sa'Mon deem you among their most valiant and trustworthy allies.  To honor you, they bestow upon you a token of great power, wrought in one of their likenesses.  You have earned all previous non-exclusive tier rewards + a 3D printed model of one of the main characters from the Blood And Snow story line + an invitation to our wrap party (travel and accommodations not included) + "Producer" credits.  In-Game/Forum title: Nar'Sa'Mon Darrj (ally).

DINNER WITH THE FOUNDERS OF SHADOWFORGE - - - You have earned all previous non-exclusive tier rewards + a nice dinner with the Shadowforge founders! (travel and accommodations not included) + "Executive Producer" credits and Game/Forum title: "The Almighty".
